content: Hm ok, I thought there might be some built-in function in Classical that was like not_forall_iff, but this is not the case? I realize v4 is still pre-release, just checking...
There is, it's just in Mathlib. It's called not_forall.

The "main" one is still the lean 3 version for now, yeah. There's a WIP port that's (for now) called Mathlib4: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/tree/master/Mathlib

not_forall is in the Lean 4 version, it's in Logic/Basic.lean.
Mark Wilhelm has marked this topic as resolved.
